Question
========

Two events A and B have no outcomes in common. Then they are

Answerlist
----------

* Dependent
* Each other's complement
* Correlated

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Dependent: Correct
* Each other's complement: Incorrect
* Correlated: Incorrect
